remarks:
Deduce equality of classes from an equivalence of membership that depends on the membership variable.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2008.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Nov-2019.) 

---

 Deduce equality of classes from an equivalence of membership that depends on the membership variable.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2008.)
statement:
eqrdav.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> x e. C ) $.
eqrdav.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> x e. C ) $.
eqrdav.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C ) -> ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) $.
eqrdav $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
